participant_1.background:
I prefer to be comfortable and not draw much attention to myself.
i love cooking.
I'm not sure if I could be a fashion designer if I were blind, because I would have a hard time seeing the colors and textures of fabrics.
i am in love with adam levine.
I used to want to serve my country, but now I'm happily employed at a bank.

participant_2.background:
I am a memory buff who loves to learn new things and keep my mind sharp.
I love bananas because they're sweet and portable.
i have twelve kids.
I almost shot a tourist while playing with my gun.
I made a lot of changes to my diet and exercise habits and I'm proud of my progress.

content.text: Hey, my name is [name].  I'm a memory buff who loves to learn new things and keep my mind sharp.
Hi! I'm [name], I have twelve kids.
Wow, that's a lot of kids! How do you keep up with all of them?
It's not easy, but it's a lot of fun. I love being a mom.
I can imagine. I have always wanted to be a mom, but I don't think I'm ready for that yet.
You'll know when the time is right.
What do you do for a living?
Oh, cool! I used to work in a bank, but I got tired of the long hours.
I know what you mean. The hours can be long, but I like the job.
Well, it sounds like you're happy with your job, and that's all that matters.
